attributes.action: to allow scottish people   to  have  their   money what ever  bank to  be   accepted  with  out question  and  not be  treated  like   a   white  race  issue
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for centuries Scotland  has  been part  of the  united   kingdom we now  have  our  own  government and yet we   must   have  english money before we  leave   sotland  as  i have   been  refused my money bieng accepted in  the   cities  of  London i was refused 6 times  in  shops and  macdonald  resteraunts , in  manchester first bus   drivers  through money  back  and  all this  because   we   are Scottish   money and  our  money does  not   seem  to  be  good   enough as  legal tender and  its time  the  insults to  the  scots were stopped if the rest   of   the  world accept money then our own countries  money (scottish ) should  be  accepted the sooner  the  better if we   are united kingdom then lets  be  united  in money

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
